description: This file sets up authentication instructions for Trello tools and initializes an agent with specific instructions and tools, then executes a command to create a board, lists, and cards in Trello.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent configured with instructions and tools to interact with Trello.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to output a response or execute a command, with optional streaming.
